channel.title: Review on Partially Attended
channel.description: Recent content in Review on Partially Attended

item.title: ArXiV at 20, a brief review.
item.description: I just read the brief article by Paul Ginsparg about 20 years of the ArXiV. I think the article is a must read for anyone who is thinking about scientific communication. It’s short, and very readable. The things that stand out for me from this article are the following: There are real costs associated with running services on the web. Ginsparg originally imagined that the service that he created could run automatically and that he would be able to get back to his research projects very quickly.
